thread.title: Former GE CEO Jeff Immelt named chairman of Athena Health

author: Erik Freeland
title: Former GE CEO Jeff Immelt named chairman of Athena Health

organizations.name: board's nominating and corporate governance committee

text:
Former GE CEO Jeff Immelt named chairman of Athena Health Published 12 Mins Ago Erik Freeland | Corbis Historical | Getty Images Jeffrey Immelt (center), executive at General Electric Corporation, attends a press conference in New York. 
Former General Electric CEO and Chairman Jeff Immelt was appointed chairman of Athenahealth 's Board of Directors. 
"We are thrilled to welcome Jeff as the new independent chairman of the athenahealth Board," Dev Ittycheria, chair of the Board's Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee said in a statement. 
This story is developing. Please check back for updates. Related Securities
